mapper.select: SELECT roomno, roomtype, title, floor, area, fee, confirmdate, address, dong, ho, latitude, longitude, region_2depth_name, region_3depth_name, userno FROM room WHERE roomno=#{roomno};

SELECT roomno, roomtype, title, floor, area, fee, confirmdate, address, dong, ho, latitude, longitude, region_2depth_name, region_3depth_name, userno FROM room
roomtype LIKE concat('%', #{roomtype}, '%')
OR floor LIKE concat('%', #{floor}, '%')
ORDER BY no ASC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{listCount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room (roomtype, title, floor, area, fee, confirmdate, address, dong, ho, latitude, longitude, region_2depth_name, region_3depth_name, userno) VALUES (#{roomtype}, #{title}, #{floor}, #{area}, #{fee}, #{confirmdate}, #{address}, #{dong}, #{ho}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{region_2depth_name}, #{region_3depth_name}, #{userno});
